testcase.name: verify that user is able to view left & right arrow icons after hovering mouse over the slideshow of product banners & browse product banners
testcase.system-out: Given user has valid URL of website.........................................passed When user enters URL of website in Google Chrome browser & press enter......passed Then user should be on home page............................................passed When user hovers mouse over slideshow of product banners....................passed Then user should be able to view left & right arrow icons in left & right sections in slideshow respectively.passed When user clicks on left arrow icon in left section in slideshow of product banners.passed Then user should be able to view product banner behind the current product banner in slideshow of product banners.passed When user clicks on right arrow icon in right section in slideshow of product banners.passed Then user should be able to view product banner ahead of the current product banner in slideshow of product banners.passed

testcase.name: verify that user is able to browse different product banners after clicking on carousel-indicators that is filled circles down the slideshow of product banners
testcase.system-out: Given user has valid URL of website.........................................passed When user enters URL of website in Google Chrome browser & press enter......passed Then user should be on home page............................................passed When user clicks on second carousel-indicator that is second filled circle down the slideshow of product banners.passed Then user should be able to browse second product banner....................passed When user clicks on first carousel-indicator that is first filled circle down the slideshow of product banners.passed Then user should be able to browse first product banner.....................passed

testcase.classname: Navigation functionality of phone number And phone icon
testcase.name: Verify that user should be able to navigate to Contact Us webpage after clicking on phone icon & phone number from header of home page
